participant_abstract.sent: We discussed all relevant points and came to a decision about functionality, what buttons we need and so on.
This is useful now to go away and think about this specifically before considering style.

participant_actions.sent: Expand research - 2 designers come up with some models.
Market expert: research on age groups and whether the young range we will target actually have any buying power.

participant_problems.sent: What we can include for our budget: for example we would like voice recognition technology but this is just unrealistic.
